title: Help to identify font
content:
Can anyone help me identify the font for the attached image? Any help would be greatly appreciated!

| Attachment | Size |
| --- | --- |
| [lettering.jpg](http://web.archive.org/web/20150415115424/http:/typophile.com/files/lettering_4.jpg) | 630.81 KB |
author: Rennie40

comments.content:
It must be **[Maven Pro (Bold)](http://web.archive.org/web/20150415115424/http:/www.findmyfont.com/index.php/fonts/font-preview?fset=Google-Web-Fonts&ffam=Maven%20Pro%20-%20Bold&fid=f67abf55e50121eb6c3eb0ba05951a31&fstyle=i&fsize=60&text=lady%20cavaliers&wrap=2)** by Joe Prince (part of Google Web Fonts), manually slanted and probably a bit compressed

------------------  
I found it using "Find my Font": [http://www.findmyfont.com](http://web.archive.org/web/20150415115424/http:/www.findmyfont.com/ "http://www.findmyfont.com")
You're exactly right! Thanks for the help! And, thanks for the Find My Font tool. Had tried a couple other tools with no luck.
